mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks",
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( id, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, del_flag, remarks, ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, )
mapper.update: UPDATE SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateTime}, del_flag = #{delFlag}, remarks = #{remarks}, WHERE id = #{id}
